Free Runner

The Free Runner is a hero subclass for the Rogue class in Remixed Dungeon.

Description

The _Freerunner_ can move almost twice faster, than most of the monsters. When he is running, the Freerunner is much harder to hit. For that he must be unencumbered and not starving.

Unlocking

The Free Runner subclass can be unlocked by using a Tome of Mastery after defeating the second boss (Tengu). This item can also be used with a Tengu Liver if using a class that normally can't use Tomes of Mastery.

Special Mechanics

The Free Runner has the following special mechanics:

  • Speed Advantage: Moves almost twice as fast as most monsters
  • Evasion: Much harder to hit when in motion
  • Requirements: Must be unencumbered and not starving to maintain speed advantage
  • Movement Bonuses: Natural speed bonuses when conditions are met

Special Armor

Using an Armor Kit on any armor will transform it into Free Runner Armor, which is specifically designed for this subclass.

Advantages

  • Significantly faster movement speed when conditions are met
  • Harder to hit when running
  • Excellent for escape and positioning
  • Good for hit-and-run tactics

Disadvantages

  • Requires being unencumbered (not overburdened)
  • Must not be starving
  • Speed advantage is lost when heavily loaded
  • Requires careful food management
